title: Introducing: Marcus McCoan
body:
Going to be honest, this wasn’t at all what I expected when I saw **Marcus McCoan’s** profile picture.

Instead of the acoustic led singer-songwriter I’d expected, Marcus McCoan’s debut offering Call Out is a Years & Years inspired slice of straight up pop; slick, well produced and thoroughly enjoyable. Check it below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
